description: a(n) = product of all even composite numbers between n-th prime and (n+1)-st prime.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
example: a(4) = 80 = 8 X 10, as 7 is the 4rd prime and 11 is the 5th prime.
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,50,p=1:for(k=prime(n)+1, prime(n+1)-1,if(k%2==0,p=p*k)):print1(p","))(PARI) { n=0; q=2; forprime (p=3, prime(2001), a=1; for (i=q + 1, p - 1, if (i%2==0, a*=i)); q=p; write("b061216.txt", n++, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 19 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 22 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Ralf Stephan_, Mar 22 2003
